TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit LinkTarget extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示某页上的一个元素，可以从其他文档或同一文档中的其他位置链接到该元素。

span.span: Represents an element on a page that can be linked to from other documents or other places in the same document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有链接目标的名称中的页的所有收集到的页面内容部分[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]文档。The names of all of the link targets for all of the pages in a are gathered into the Page Content part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document. 这样，使用方应用程序以确定是否特定的目标是在特定文档而无需加载整个文档。This enables consuming applications to determine if a particular target is in a particular document without having to load the entire document. 有关详细信息``并``元素，请参阅第 3 章[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]可以获取在规范[XPS： 规范和许可证下载](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)。For more information about the `` and `` elements, see chapter 3 of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] specification which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Name : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置此 标识为可链接元素的元素名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the element that this identifies as a linkable element.

value.span: 一个 ，与对应于此 元素的标记元素的 属性相同。

span.span: A that is identical to the property of the markup element that corresponds to this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有链接目标的名称中的页的所有收集到的页面内容部分[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]文档。The names of all of the link targets for all of the pages in a are gathered into the Page Content part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document. 这样，使用方应用程序以确定是否特定的目标是在特定文档而无需加载整个文档。This enables consuming applications to determine if a particular target is in a particular document without having to load the entire document. 有关详细信息``并``元素，请参阅第 3 章[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]可以获取在规范[XPS： 规范和许可证下载](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)。For more information about the `` and `` elements, see chapter 3 of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] specification which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
